Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Others
      • Player

  • public class Player
extends Others
    Player object is subclass of Others.java; Players creates the object that
    the user directly controls and determines the interactions for within Driver.java

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player()
      Default constructor, setting:
      homeState to the default State constructor values
      _party to Majority party in _homeState
      _income to the _averageIncome in _homeState
      Player(State state)
      Overloaded constructor, setting:
      homeState to the inputted State
      _party to Majority party in _homeState
      _income to the _averageIncome in _homeState times 10

    • Method Summary

      Accessor method for _homeState

      Calculates score for Player based on work representing _homeState
      in accordance with its preferences in the Senate

      • Player

        Default constructor, setting:
        homeState to the default State constructor values

      • Player

        public Player(State state)
        Overloaded constructor, setting:
        homeState to the inputted State
        _party to Majority party in _homeState
        _income to the _averageIncome in _homeState times 10
        Parameters:
        state - state from which Player is elected, will fill _homeState

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        public State getState()
        Accessor method for _homeState
        Returns:
        _homeState

      • legisAchievement

        public int legisAchievement(Legislation bill)
        Calculates score for Player based on work representing _homeState
        in accordance with its preferences in the Senate
        Parameters:
        bill - Legislation that was voted on by Player, that affects _homeState in some way
        Returns:
        int representing achievement in representing _homeState's interests with Player's vote on bill
